ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:17}); // {Red XIII}
Hm, that's interesting.{PAUSE}It's not as if I'm doing this because I
want to.{PAUSE}You see, this tail of mine, moves quite
independently of my will.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:30}); // {Yuffie}
Ah, {Cloud}!
Let me make a buck why don't you?{PAUSE}I'm sellin' Materia.
Why don't you buy some?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:31}); // {Yuffie}
Orders are taken at the counter.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:48}); // I don't feel like sightseeing around town.
What I really want to do is have fun
too bad Gold Saucer is temporarily closed.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // Let's see.
I recommend a resort located
on the outskirts of the city.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // If you're looking for souvenirs,
we recommend Butch's.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Wait a minute.
I'm going to look at my guidebook.{PAUSE}It says,
Costa del Sol is the gateway to the West,
and is a prominent world renown resort,
which has been around for ages.{PAUSE}Come on! I don't care about that!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // You're kidding!
You can't tell just by looking.{PAUSE}But I'll tell you just in case.{PAUSE}After relaxing at Costa del Sol,
stop by the Gold Saucer.
It's a rich and exciting place to play!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // I thought so.{PAUSE}Are you interested?
This is the road to Gold Saucer.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // Head south to the Gold Saucer, and you'll
find casinos and an amusement park.{PAUSE}But if you're planning to walk,
you'll have to cross mountains and valleys.
I wouldn't recommend it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // But if you're on a vacation,
you should go there at least once.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Oh, really?
I'm a little bored.{PAUSE}Come on, back to work now!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Isn't that good?
You're just expecting too much.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:50}); // Wanna buy a souvenir to remember
participating in the Meteor tour?

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:26}); // How about some 'Soft'
as a memento of this wonderful trip?
Made especially in Costa del Sol!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // Butch
Well, we're lucky to have that cutie
working for us part-time.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:49}); // Butch
Good or bad everything's gotta go!
It's the end of the world sale!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:29}); // Butch
You got me there
We just hired her part-time.{PAUSE}She ran off with our money and Materia.{PAUSE}I guess any situation that seems too good
to be true, usually is.{PAUSE}Well, please feel free to browse around.
Just don't mind looking at leftovers.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:27}); // Butch
Yeah, I'd like to find a gorgeous chick
and have a great time.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:27}); // Butch
Yeah, I'd like to find a gorgeous chick
and have a great time.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:53}); // They're burning.
Someday they'll burn out.{PAUSE}The stars are just like our youth.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:25}); // Why don't we compromise?
We'll make do with what we have.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:24}); // I guess so.
Well, I envy the plain Janes.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:23}); // Well, that's because
we're just too beautiful
and hard to approach.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:22}); // But only your average Joes
are trying to pick us up.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:21}); // You're right.
After all, this trip was expensive.
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:20}); // Not yet. Remember, no compromises.
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:19}); // Shall we play our hand around here?
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:37}); // What's wrong with you!?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:54}); // Ho! Ho! Ho!
It's the end of the world.

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:51}); // Oh wow!!
Man, that's huge!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:52}); // The stars!!
They're in flames!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:32}); // It hurts when you kick me
with your bare feet!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // It's the ocean.
A creepy man was signaling for us to come.{PAUSE}I was scared to come here!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:16}); // It's the ocean.
A creepy man was signaling for us to come.{PAUSE}I was scared to come here!

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:15}); // I heard.
That big dog talks like a human.{PAUSE}That's cool
but weird.

dialogStrings: Costa del Sol

Say, aren't you bored?
{CHOICE}Not that much
{CHOICE}Yeah, we fight a lot

Isn't that good?
You're just expecting too much.

Oh, really?
I'm a little bored.{PAUSE}Come on, back to work now!

Here you are!
The Costa del Sol tourist information guide.{PAUSE}What do you want to know?
{CHOICE}Where's the inn?
{CHOICE}Where're the stores?

Let's see.

on the outskirts of the city.

If you're looking for souvenirs,
we recommend Butch's.

I'm going to look at my guidebook.{PAUSE}It says,

and is a prominent world renown resort,

If you want a good time,
go to the beach!
There are lots of beautiful women.{PAUSE}You wouldn't happen to berich?

It's a rich and exciting place to play!

This is the road to Gold Saucer.

Head south to the Gold Saucer, and you'll
find casinos and an amusement park.{PAUSE}But if you're planning to walk,
you'll have to cross mountains and valleys.
I wouldn't recommend it.

But if you're on a vacation,

We jus' hangin' out!!{PAUSE}Oh, the sun's so bright!
Looks like another wonderful day!

1, 2, 3,
here we go!

I heard.
That big dog talks like a human.{PAUSE}That's cool
but weird.

It's the ocean.
A creepy man was signaling for us to come.{PAUSE}I was scared to come here!

and hard to approach.

I guess so.
